name: Quick and Easy Spaghetti with Smoked Salmon and Parsley in Cream Sauce
author: ilka222
summary: This is one of my favorite recipes during the week cause it's so quick and easy. It is basically ready as soon as the spaghetti is cooked al dente. If you'd like a vegetarian version, just leave off the smoked salmon.
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Combine cream, butter, and garlic in a small pot while spaghetti is cooking and heat over low heat until hot
Stir in parsley, lemon juice, and lemon zest
Heat until cream sauce is heated through but not boiling
Drain spaghetti and place into a large bowl with cream sauce
Stir in smoked salmon and serve immediately with freshly grated Parmesan cheese
